FuncDef: This command is used to reference the source context from which the TWAMP Light packet will be launched by name. Therouter-instancerouter-instanceconfiguration is the preferred method for referencing and references the launch context by name, not number or alias that convertsservice-nameto a number.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the preferred method for entering a service name. Stored as the service name. Only service linking function that is allowed for both mixed-mode and model-driven configuration modes, up to 64 characters.
